meeting_info.organization: Oak Cliff Gateway TIF District Board of Directors

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of the Meeting Record
agenda_items.description: Review and consideration of the Meeting Record of the February 26, 2024 Oak Cliff Gateway TIF District Board Meeting.
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, District Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of a recommended target area
agenda_items.description: Review and consideration of a recommended target area for the Department of Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization to deploy funding to be annually transferred from the Oak Cliff Gateway TIF District for homeowner stabilization and displacement mitigation programs (including home repair/improvement programs and homebuyer assistance programs) in a cumulative total amount not to exceed $2,958,169 (net present value) or approximately $10,507,096 in total dollars pursuant to the Oak Cliff Gateway TIF Districtâ€™s Project Plan and Reinvestment Zone Financing Plan and Increment Allocation Policy.
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, District Manager, Office of Economic Development; Thor Erickson, Assistant Director, Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization Department

financial_items.description: Funding for homeowner stabilization and displacement mitigation programs
